WidgetInfo.Description: A dynamically generated cartographic scalebar that looks like the Google scalebar
WidgetInfo.Label: ScalebarDual

Parameter.Name: MaxWidth
Parameter.Description: Maximum width of the scalebar in pixels
Parameter.Label: Maximum width

Parameter.Name: TopInUnits
Parameter.Description: Units for zoomed in on top bar
Parameter.Label: Top bar units (zoomed in)

Parameter.Name: TopOutUnits
Parameter.Description: Units for zoomed out on top bar
Parameter.Label: Top bar units (zoomed out)

Parameter.Name: BottomInUnits
Parameter.Description: Units for zoomed in on bottom bar
Parameter.Label: Bottom bar units (zoomed in)

Parameter.Name: BottomOutUnits
Parameter.Description: Units for zoomed out on bottom bar
Parameter.Label: Bottom bar units (zoomed out)
